original_title: 超級 x 皮塔餅成本特別瞳
overview: MOODYZ super body actress Hitomi wears carefully selected costumes that shower off her body!! She's a nurse! An American waitress! An undercover investigator! She puts on a competitive swimsuit! She's a dance instructor! A female ninja! An extravagant special that shows off her various bodylines in 6 different ways!!
title: The Perfect Body in Tight Clothes - SPECIAL Hitomi
